trans-unit.source: Allows you to install and configure an event log that your application reads from or writes to when running.
trans-unit.target: 可以安装和配置你的应用程序从读取或运行时将写入事件日志。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of categories in the category resource file.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置类别资源文件中的类别数。

trans-unit.source: Use the CategoryCount and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.CategoryResourceFile%2A> properties to write events with localized category strings.
trans-unit.target: 使用 CategoryCount 和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.CategoryResourceFile%2A>属性来写入事件时使用本地化的类别字符串。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.CategoryResourceFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer displays the category for an event entry, if you supply a category when you write the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果你在写入该事件时提供一种类别，事件查看器将显示事件项中，类别。

trans-unit.source: Event log categories are application-defined strings that help filter events, or provide information on an event.
trans-unit.target: 事件日志类别是应用程序定义的字符串，用于帮助筛选事件，或提供有关事件的信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, your application can define separate categories for different components or different operations.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你的应用程序可以定义为不同的组件或不同的操作分隔不同类别。

trans-unit.source: Event categories are optional; if your application does not use categories, do not set the CategoryCount and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.CategoryResourceFile%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 事件类别是可选的;如果你的应用程序不使用类别，则不要设置 CategoryCount 和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.CategoryResourceFile%2A>属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.CategoryResourceFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何定义事件消息和生成事件资源文件的详细信息，请参阅处平台 SDK 文档中的"消息编译器"主题[http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。

trans-unit.source: The number of categories in the category resource file.
trans-unit.target: 类别资源文件中的类别的数目。

trans-unit.source: The default value is zero.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为零。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the resource file that contains category strings for the source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含源的类别字符串的资源文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.CategoryCount%2A> and CategoryResourceFile properties to write events with localized category strings.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.CategoryCount%2A>和 CategoryResourceFile 属性要写入事件的本地化类别字符串。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.CategoryCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer displays the category for an event entry if you supply a category when you write the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果你在写入该事件时提供一种类别，事件查看器将显示事件项的类别。

trans-unit.source: Event log categories are application-defined strings that help filter events, or provide information about an event.
trans-unit.target: 事件日志类别是应用程序定义的字符串，帮助筛选事件，或提供有关的事件的信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, your application might have separate categories for different components or different operations.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你的应用程序可能具有不同的组件或不同的操作的单独类别。

trans-unit.source: Event categories are optional; if your application does not use categories, do not set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.CategoryCount%2A> and CategoryResourceFile properties.
trans-unit.target: 事件类别是可选的;如果你的应用程序不使用类别，则不要设置<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.CategoryCount%2A>和 CategoryResourceFile 属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.CategoryCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何定义事件消息和生成事件资源文件的详细信息，请参阅处平台 SDK 文档中的"消息编译器"主题[http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。

trans-unit.source: The path of the category resource file.
trans-unit.target: 类别资源文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Copies the property values of an <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref> component that are required at installation time for an event log.
trans-unit.target: 将复制的属性值<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref>在事件日志的安装时所需的组件。

trans-unit.source: The component specified by the `component` parameter must be an <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>; otherwise, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定的组件`component`参数必须是<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>; 否则为将引发异常。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: Typically, you do not call the methods of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> from within your code; they are generally called only by the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，不调用的方法<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>从在代码中; 它们通常称为只能由[Installutil.exe （安装程序工具）](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: CopyFromComponent is used by Installutil.exe to set the property values for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> to the values of an existing <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>.
trans-unit.target: Installutil.exe 使用 CopyFromComponent 来设置的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>现有<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>的值</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>的属性值

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> that is passed in is an empty string (""), you must set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> property to a valid value before the installer executes.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>，它是在传递为空字符串 ("")，必须设置<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>为有效的值之前在安装程序执行的属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> to use as a template for the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>以用作模板<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified component is not an <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的组件不是<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log*> or <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source*> property of the specified component is either <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or empty.
trans-unit.target: -或- <> </> *1> 或<> *1> 的指定组件的属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>或为空。

trans-unit.source: Performs the installation and writes event log information to the registry.
trans-unit.target: 执行安装，并将事件日志信息写入到注册表。

trans-unit.source: The Install method writes event log information to the registry, and associates the event log with a log that is specified by the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Log%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 安装方法将事件日志信息写入注册表中，并将事件日志与由指定的日志关联起来<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Log%2A>属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Log%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the log does not already exist (and a source is specified), Install creates a log and associates the new source with it.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在日志 （和指定源），安装将创建一个日志，并将新的源与它相关联。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you do not call the methods of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> from within your code; they are generally called only by the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，不调用的方法<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>从在代码中; 它们通常称为只能由[Installutil.exe （安装程序工具）](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: The tool automatically calls the Install method during the installation process to write registry information that is associated with the event log being installed.
trans-unit.target: 该工具会在安装过程中要写入事件日志正在安装的注册表信息自动调用安装方法。

trans-unit.source: Installation is transactional, so if there is a failure of any installation project component during the installation, all the previously-installed components are rolled back to their pre-installation states.
trans-unit.target: 安装是事务性的因此如果在安装过程中的任何安装项目组件故障，则所有以前安装的组件将回滚到其安装前的状态。

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished by calling each component's <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Rollback%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 这通过调用每个组件实现<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Rollback%2A>方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Rollback%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> to register a new source for a new or existing event log; do not use <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> to change an existing source.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>注册一个新的或现有的事件日志; 新的源不使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>若要更改现有源。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> class does not modify the configuration properties of an existing source to match the specified installation properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>类不会修改现有源以匹配的指定的安装属性的配置属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: The Install method throws an exception if the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Source%2A> property matches a source name that is registered for a different event log on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 安装方法时引发异常<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Source%2A>属性与注册的计算机上的不同事件日志的源名称匹配。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Install method skips registering the source if the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Source%2A> property matches a source name that is already registered for the same event log specified in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Log%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 安装方法跳过注册源，如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Source%2A>属性与匹配的已注册为相同的事件日志中指定的源名称<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Log%2A>属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Log%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: An application's install routine uses the project installer's <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to automatically maintain information about the components that have already been installed.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序的安装例程使用项目安装程序的<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性来自动维护有关已安装的组件的信息。</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This state information, which is passed to Install as the `stateSaver` parameter, is continuously updated as the tool installs each <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>.
trans-unit.target: 此状态信息，传递给作为安装的`stateSaver`参数，将持续更新，因为该工具会安装每个<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: Usually, it is not necessary for your code to explicitly modify this state information.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，不需要为你的代码来显式修改此状态信息。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> used to save information needed to perform a rollback or uninstall operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>用于保存执行回滚或卸载操作所需的信息。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The platform the installer is trying to use is not Windows NT 4.0 or later.
trans-unit.target: 安装程序尝试使用该平台不是 Windows NT 4.0 或更高版本。

trans-unit.source: The name specified in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Source*> property is already registered for a different event log.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Source*>为不同的事件日志。 已注册属性</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Source*>中指定的名称

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an installer and another specified installer refer to the same source.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否安装程序，而另一个指定安装程序将引用到相同的源。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you do not call the methods of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> from within your code; they are generally called only by the Installer tool (Installutil.exe).
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，不调用的方法<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>从在代码中; 它们是通常只能由调用的安装程序工具 (Installutil.exe)。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: The installer to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的安装程序。

trans-unit.source: if this installer and the installer specified by the otherInstaller parameter would install or uninstall the same source; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果此安装程序和安装由指定 otherInstaller 参数将安装或卸载相同的源; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the log to set the source to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要将源设置的日志的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the log.
trans-unit.target: 日志的名称。

trans-unit.source: This can be Application, System, or a custom log name.
trans-unit.target: 这可以是应用程序、 系统或自定义日志名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the resource file that contains message formatting strings for the source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含消息源的字符串设置格式的资源文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: The path of the message resource file.
trans-unit.target: 消息资源文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the resource file that contains message parameter strings for the source.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含消息源的参数字符串的资源文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: Use the ParameterResourceFile property to configure an event log source to write localized event messages with inserted parameter strings.
trans-unit.target: ParameterResourceFile 属性用于配置将使用插入的参数字符串的本地化的事件消息写入事件日志源。

trans-unit.source: Each localized event message specified in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.MessageResourceFile%2A> property can contain placeholders for insertion strings.
trans-unit.target: 中指定每个本地化的事件消息<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.MessageResourceFile%2A>属性可以包含插入字符串的占位符。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.MessageResourceFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: These placeholders are used to specify the position and resource identifier for a language-independent string within the event message.
trans-unit.target: 这些占位符用于指定的位置和事件消息中的独立于语言的字符串的资源标识符。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer replaces the placeholders with the corresponding strings from the ParameterResourceFile and formats the event log message for the localized event entry.
trans-unit.target: 事件查看器使用从 ParameterResourceFile 的相应字符串替换占位符和格式本地化的事件项的事件日志消息。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following section of a message text file defines a string with a parameter placeholder: ``` MessageId = 1501 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = COMPONENT_STARTING Language=English Component %%6050 is starting. . ``` Within the parameter resource file, the insertion string must be defined with the resource identifier that corresponds to the placeholder, as shown below: ``` MessageId = 6050 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = COMPONENT_NAME_MSGID Language=English TRIGGER.EXE . ``` The event source must be configured either for writing localized entries or for writing direct strings.
trans-unit.target: 例如，以下部分的消息文本文件定义的参数占位符的字符串︰``` MessageId = 1501 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = COMPONENT_STARTING Language=English Component %%6050 is starting. . ```在参数资源文件中，插入字符串必须使用定义的资源标识符，对应于占位符，如下所示︰``` MessageId = 6050 Severity = Success Facility = Application SymbolicName = COMPONENT_NAME_MSGID Language=English TRIGGER.EXE . ```写入本地化的项或要直接写入字符串，则必须配置事件源。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> method to write localized entries for a source configured with a message resource file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>方法写入本地化的项配置了消息资源文件的源。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application writes event message strings directly to the event log, or if your <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.MessageResourceFile%2A> does not contain messages with parameter insertion placeholders, do not set the ParameterResourceFile property.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序将事件消息字符串直接写入事件日志中，或者你<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.MessageResourceFile%2A>不包含消息具有参数插入占位符，不要设置 ParameterResourceFile 属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.MessageResourceFile%2A>

trans-unit.source: For details about defining event messages and building event resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何定义事件消息和生成事件资源文件的详细信息，请参阅处平台 SDK 文档中的"消息编译器"主题[http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。

trans-unit.source: The path of the message parameter resource file.
trans-unit.target: 消息参数资源文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Restores the computer to the state it was in before the installation by rolling back the event log information that the installation procedure wrote to the registry.
trans-unit.target: 将计算机还原到它所处的状态在安装之前通过回滚的安装过程已写入到注册表的事件日志信息。

trans-unit.source: The Rollback method undoes the effects of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Install%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Rollback 方法撤消的效果<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Install%2A>方法。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Install%2A>

trans-unit.source: Rollback is called if the installation of any component in the installation project fails.
trans-unit.target: 如果安装项目中的任何组件的安装失败时，会调用回滚。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Install%2A> method creates or sets the properties for an event log and event source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Install%2A>方法创建或设置事件日志和事件源的属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Install%2A>

trans-unit.source: Rollback either deletes the event log and source or resets the properties of a pre-existing source to its pre-installation values.
trans-unit.target: 回滚删除的事件日志和源，或将预先存在的源的属性重置为其安装前的值。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you do not call the methods of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> from within your code; they are generally called only by the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，不调用的方法<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>从在代码中; 它们通常称为只能由[Installutil.exe （安装程序工具）](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: The tool calls the Rollback method, when this or another component has failed to install, to undo any changes that the installation process has already made.
trans-unit.target: 该工具调用 Rollback 方法中，当这个或另一个组件出现故障，若要安装，若要撤消安装过程中已进行任何更改时。

trans-unit.source: An application's install routine uses the project installer's <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to automatically maintain information about the components that have already been installed.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序的安装例程使用项目安装程序的<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性来自动维护有关已安装的组件的信息。</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This state information, which is passed to Rollback as the `savedState` parameter, is continuously updated as the tool rolls back each <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>.
trans-unit.target: 此状态信息，传递给为回滚的`savedState`参数，将持续更新，因为该工具回滚每个<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: Usually, it is not necessary for your code to explicitly modify this state information.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，不需要为你的代码来显式修改此状态信息。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains the pre-installation state of the computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>包含计算机的安装前状态。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source name to register with the log.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要注册的日志的源名称。

trans-unit.source: The event source indicates what logs the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件源指示什么来记录事件。

trans-unit.source: It is often the name of the application, or the name of a component within a large application.
trans-unit.target: 它通常是应用程序的名称或大型应用程序内的一个组件的名称。

trans-unit.source: The installer uses the value of the Source property to register your application with the event log as a valid source of entries.
trans-unit.target: 安装程序使用源属性的值以将你的应用程序注册事件日志条目的有效源。

trans-unit.source: A new source name cannot match an existing source name or an existing event log name.
trans-unit.target: 新的源名称不能与现有源名称或现有的事件日志名称匹配。

trans-unit.source: Each source can only write to one event log at a time; however, your application can use multiple sources to write to multiple event logs.
trans-unit.target: 每个源可以仅写入一个事件日志一次;但是，你的应用程序可以使用多个源写入多个事件日志。

trans-unit.source: For example, your application might require multiple sources configured for different event logs or different resource files.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你的应用程序可能需要为不同的事件日志或不同的资源文件配置的多个源。

trans-unit.source: Applications and services should write to the Application log or a custom log.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序和服务应写入应用程序日志或自定义日志。

trans-unit.source: Device drivers should write to the System log.
trans-unit.target: 设备驱动程序应写入系统日志。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a log name before the installer runs, the installer registers your source to the Application log.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定安装程序运行之前的日志名称，安装程序将注册你的应用程序日志的源。

trans-unit.source: If you specify the name of a log that does not exist, the system registers the Source to that log, but the log is not created until the first entry is written to it.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定不存在日志的名称，系统将向此日志，此源注册但直到不创建日志会向其写入的第一个条目。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> to register a new source for a new or existing event log; do not use <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> to change an existing source.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>注册一个新的或现有的事件日志; 新的源不使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>若要更改现有源。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> class does not modify the configuration properties of an existing source to match the specified installation properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>类不会修改现有源以匹配的指定的安装属性的配置属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Install%2A> method throws an exception if the Source property matches a source name that is registered for a different event log on the computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Install%2A>方法引发异常，如果源属性与注册的计算机上的不同事件日志源名称匹配。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Install%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Install%2A> method does not register the source if the Source property matches a source name that is already registered for the same event log specified in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Log%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Install%2A>方法不会注册源，如果源属性与匹配的已注册为相同的事件日志中指定的源名称<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Log%2A>属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Log%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Install%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more detailed information about the behaviors of event logs and sources, see the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> class documentation for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细的事件日志和源有关各种行为的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>类文档<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A>属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Source%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Log%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: The name to register with the event log as a source of entries.
trans-unit.target: 要注册的事件日志的条目的源的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Removes an installation by removing event log information from the registry.
trans-unit.target: 通过从注册表中删除事件日志信息来移除安装。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.UninstallAction%2A> property value is `Remove`, the Uninstall method deletes the source and the associated log that the installer created if the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Log%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Source%2A> properties specified the creation of a new event log and source.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.UninstallAction%2A>属性值是`Remove`，卸载方法删除源，并关联日志安装程序创建如果<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Log%2A>和<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Source%2A>属性指定创建新的事件日志和源。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Source%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.Log%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller.UninstallAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, you do not call the methods of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> from within your code; they are generally called only by the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) in uninstall mode.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，不调用的方法<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>从在代码中; 它们通常称为只能由[Installutil.exe （安装程序工具）](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)中卸载模式。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: The tool automatically calls the Uninstall method to restore the parts of the system that were affected by the installation to their pre-installation states.
trans-unit.target: 该工具将自动调用卸载方法使受其安装前的状态，安装的系统部件还原。

trans-unit.source: This includes deleting registry information that is associated with the event log being uninstalled.
trans-unit.target: 这包括删除事件日志正在卸载的注册表信息。

trans-unit.source: An application's uninstall routine uses the project installer's <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to automatically maintain information about the components that have already been uninstalled.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序的卸载例程使用项目安装程序的<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性来自动维护有关已卸载的组件的信息。</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Context%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This state information, which is passed to Uninstall as the `savedState` parameter, is continuously updated as the tool uninstalls each <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>.
trans-unit.target: 传递给为卸载此状态信息`savedState`参数，将持续更新，该工具卸载每个<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: Usually, it is not necessary for your code to explicitly modify this state information.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，不需要为你的代码来显式修改此状态信息。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that contains the pre-installation state of the computer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>包含计算机的安装前状态。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) should remove the event log or leave it in its installed state at uninstall time.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否[Installutil.exe （安装程序工具）](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)事件日志或将其安装状态在卸载时应删除。

trans-unit.source: When you install an event log, you can optionally connect it to an existing log.
trans-unit.target: 安装事件日志，可以根据需要连接到现有的日志。

trans-unit.source: If you do so, you must decide whether the log should return to its pre-installation state, or remain in its current, post-installation state.
trans-unit.target: 如果这样做，你必须决定是否日志应返回到其安装前的状态，还是应保持在其当前的安装后的状态。

trans-unit.source: If you elect to return the event log to its pre-installation state, changes to the event log entries at installation are not restored.
trans-unit.target: 如果您选择要返回到其安装前状态的事件日志，不会还原到在安装事件日志条目的更改。

trans-unit.source: You can reset only the event log properties that are associated with the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller> to their pre-installation values.
trans-unit.target: 你可以重置与关联的事件日志属性<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>到其安装前的值。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogInstaller>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.UninstallAction"></xref> values that indicates what state to leave the event log in when the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref> is uninstalled.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Configuration.Install.UninstallAction"></xref>值，该值指示用于将事件日志中时的状态<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLog"></xref>卸载。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Remove" name="Remove" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Remove" name="Remove" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: UninstallAction contains an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: UninstallAction 包含无效值。

trans-unit.source: The only valid values for this property are <xref uid="langword_csharp_Remove" name="Remove" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_NoAction" name="NoAction" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性唯一有效的值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Remove" name="Remove" href=""></xref>和<xref uid="langword_csharp_NoAction" name="NoAction" href=""> </xref>。
